statements: UPDATE government_regulations SET regulation_name = 'Environmental Regulations', start_date = '2022-10-01', incentive_available = TRUE WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE government_regulations SET regulatory_body = 'Department of Health', end_date = '2023-12-31', regulation_description = 'Ensuring Public Safety' WHERE regulation_id = 2;
UPDATE government_regulations SET start_date = '2022-09-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE government_regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated description', incentive_available = TRUE WHERE regulation_id = 2;
UPDATE regulations SET regulation_title = 'Environmental Regulations', regulation_description = 'Regulations for environmental conservation' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE incentives SET incentive_title = 'Solar Energy Rebate', incentive_amount = 500.00, incentive_type = 'Rebate' WHERE incentive_id = 2;
UPDATE regulations SET regulation_title = 'New Regulation Title', regulation_description = 'Updated description' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE incentives SET incentive_amount = 5000.50, incentive_type = 'Cash' WHERE incentive_id = 2;
UPDATE regulations SET compliance_status = 'COMPLIED' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE incentives SET incentive_amount = 5000.50 WHERE incentive_id = 3;
UPDATE regulations SET compliance_status = 'COMPLIED' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE incentives SET incentive_amount = 5000.00 WHERE incentive_id = 2;
UPDATE regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated description' WHERE regulation_name = 'Regulation 1';
UPDATE companies SET industry_type = 'Renewable Energy' WHERE company_name = 'Company X';
UPDATE regulations SET regulation_name = 'Updated Regulation 1', regulation_description = 'This regulation has been updated.' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE incentives SET incentive_type = 'New Type of Incentive', incentive_name = 'Updated Incentive 2' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Regulations SET description = 'Updated Regulation Description' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE Companies SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE Regulations SET description = 'Updated description for Regulation 1' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE Companies SET compliance_status = TRUE, region = 'Asia' WHERE company_name = 'Company XYZ';
